summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定設計工具是否在建立時自動顯示元件的智慧標籤面板。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a designer shows a component's smart tag panel automatically on creation.

value.span: 表示允許元件的智慧標籤面板在建立後自動開啟，否則為 。

span.span: to allow a component's smart tag panel to open automatically upon creation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件的智慧標籤面板設定為自動開啟的時機屬性是`true`。A component's smart tag panel is set to automatically open when the property is `true`.

related.span: 逐步解說：將智慧標籤加入至 Windows Form 元件

span.span: Walkthrough: Adding Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component

summary.span: 取得或設定值，啟用或停用元件快取。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables the component cache.

value.span: 如果啟用元件快取，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the component cache is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件快取是一種效能增強功能，與特定的設計工具不相容。The component cache is a performance enhancement that is incompatible with certain designers. 您可以停用與這個屬性。You can disable it with this property.
